Articles.Content:
Hi,

The 0.11 Update is now available for download!

The full changelog can be seen here.

Cheers

:D :D :D :D

woo hoo now to wait for the Download page to update.
Pardon but how do i use the new RCS thrusters in the update?

Pardon but how do i use the new RCS thrusters in the update?

R to activate it. I, J, K, L, H, and N to translate. WASD for spin.

If I just fly the attached rocket straight up until it\'s out of fuel, then let it coast and turn on 10,000x warp, the command pod breaks apart from the rest of the ship when I take it straight to 1x speed. It doesn\'t seem to break if I go to a slower warp level prior to physics being re-enabled. I assume this is the bug you\'ve been trying to reproduce.

Great work

RCS is beyond awesome, and the orbital map is very handy.

Cant wait to see what comes with 0.12 8)

Coooool! I\'ve been waiting on this release. ^^

Can\'t wait to get home and try it. ;D

Woohooo!

Looking forward to take 11.0 for a spin this weekend!
Love the orbital map view. Definitely excited about the Angular Momentum being used by ASAS, makes things work so much better. Maybe 0.12 will have proper fuel flow?
Loving the new orbital map and time compression. And the water looks much better too. (I still prefer the way it was in 9.0, but it\'s getting there. ) The splashdown effects are a nice touch.
